outputs.crs_descr: Public sector policy and administrative management
outputs.output_descr: GPAR SLIFEPA enables MOHA in setting in place more effective public administration across the respective tiers of government whilst ensuring the rights of individuals vis a vis the administrative system of Lao PDR.

project_descr: GPAR SLIFEPA is to strengthen the legal and institutional frameworks for effective public administration (national and local) and improved service delivery. It is being implemented in alignment with other projects of the National GPAR Programme.
project_title: Strengthening Legal and Institutional Frameworks for Eff
